p: The Guides are currently not finished. -> Contribute on Github

Here you can find all the important information about our Minecraft server Crystopia. Our community is friendly and helpful, and we offer you a lot of features and support for a great gaming experience.
"" - Our rules ensure a fair and enjoyable gaming experience
"" - An overview of the commands available to help you play.
"" - A helpful guide for new players to quickly find their feet. Have fun on Crystopia and if you have any questions, take a look at our guides or contact us in the Discord!
Have fun on Crystopia and if you have any questions, take a look at our guides or contact us in the Discord!
